HOME.SUMMARY: As a fullstack mid-level developer based in Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil. I specialize in creating high-quality, scalable applications with exceptional user experiences. With expertise in both front-end and back-end development, I'm able to build end-to-end solutions that are efficient. Whether it's complex architecture or intuitive user interfaces, I'm committed to delivering results that exceed client expectations.

ABOUT.TITLE: About
ABOUT.SUMMARY_1: Hey there, I'm Matheus, a fullstack developer based in Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil. For me, creating digital products is more than just a job - it's a passion. I first discovered this passion while dabbling in graphic design using Photoshop, which eventually led me to explore the exciting world of web development.
ABOUT.SUMMARY_2: With 3 years of experience under my belt, I'm always eager to learn and expand my skillset. I'm particularly interested in design patterns and principles, and strive to apply them in all of my work.
ABOUT.SUMMARY_3: My journey began as a trainee working with Ruby on Rails, and I've since broadened my horizons to include technologies such as Vue and NestJS. I love the challenge of creating user-centric applications that solve real-world problems, and I take great pride in delivering products that are not only functional, but also visually appealing.
ABOUT.SUMMARY_4: When I'm not coding, you can usually find me keeping up-to-date with the latest industry trends or experimenting with new tools and frameworks. Thanks for stopping by and getting to know me a little better!
